entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: blessedux/Dobber_agent_launchpad: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses.

entry.title: beat2319/flatiron-flows: A Node.js + Docker project that logs bike availability, weather, and AQI data from CU Boulder’s B-cycle system every 15 minutes. Data is stored in a lightweight SQLite database for time-series analysis and regression modeling.
